original_text: As he came forth of his mother's womb, naked shall he return to go as he came, and shall take nothing of his labour, which he may carry away in his hand.
korean_text: 그가 모태에서 벌거벗고 나왔은즉 그가 나온 대로 돌아가고 수고하여 얻은 것을 아무것도 자기 손에 가지고 가지 못하리니

sentences.original_text: As he came forth of his mother's womb
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 어머니의 태에서 나온 것처럼

sentences.original_text: naked shall he return to go
and shall take nothing of his labour
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 수고에서 아무것도 가져가지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: which he may carry away in his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 손에 들고 갈 수 있는 것도
